original: tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /🔽mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags //
analyzed: tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags / mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags //
translated: It is not taught for the sake of grasping feeling,🔽nor for the sake of not grasping it.

analyzed: 'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags / mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /

original: 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /🔽mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags / mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /

analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /

original: mig gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mig gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
translated: It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the tongue.🔽It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the body.

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽rna ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / rna ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽sna gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / sna gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
translated: It is not taught for the sake of apprehending tangibles.🔽It is not taught for the sake of apprehending mental phenomena.🔽It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the eye consciousness.

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽lce gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / lce gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
translated: It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the ear consciousness.🔽It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the nose consciousness.

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽lus gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / lus gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
translated: It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the tongue consciousness.🔽It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the body consciousness.

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽yid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / yid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /

analyzed: mi @495a *// gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
translated: It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the eye element.🔽It is not taught for the sake of apprehending the form element.

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽sgra gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / sgra gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /

analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of non-apprehension that he has taught the sacred doctrine.

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags /

original: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of non-apprehension that he has taught the sacred doctrine.

original: bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o //
translated: I feel all the feelings that arise from the condition of nose contact.

original: bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o //🔽bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o // bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: I am the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of tongue and taste.

original: bdag ni lus kyi 'dus @500a *//🔽te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o //🔽bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni lus kyi 'dus @500a *// te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o // bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: I am the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of body and touch.🔽I am the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mind and mental phenomena.

original: bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o //
translated: I am the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mind and mental phenomena.

original: bdag gi sa'i khams so //
analyzed: bdag gi sa'i khams so //
translated: I am the earth element.

original: bdag ni sa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni sa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
translated: I am not beyond the earth element.

original: bdag gi chu'i khams so //
analyzed: bdag gi chu'i khams so //
translated: I am the water element.

original: bdag ni chu'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni chu'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
translated: I am not beyond the water element.

original: bdag gi me'i khams so //
analyzed: bdag gi me'i khams so //
translated: I am the fire element.

original: bdag ni me'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni me'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
translated: I am not beyond the fire element.

original: bdag gi rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gi khams so //
translated: I am the wind element.

original: bdag ni rlung gi khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni rlung gi khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
translated: I am not beyond the wind element.

original: bdag gi nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: bdag gi nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: I am the space element.

original: bdag ni nam mkha'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni nam mkha'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
translated: I am not beyond the space element.

original: bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: This is my consciousness element.

original: bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o //
translated: I am not beyond the consciousness element.

original: bdag gi ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi ma rig pa'o //
translated: This is my ignorance.

original: bdag ni ma rig pa can no //🔽bdag gi 'du byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni ma rig pa can no // bdag gi 'du byed do //
translated: I am ignorant.🔽This is my formation.

original: bdag ni 'du byed pa'o //🔽bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni 'du byed pa'o // bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: I form.🔽This is my consciousness.

original: bdag ni rnam par shes par byed pa'o //🔽bdag gi ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: bdag ni rnam par shes par byed pa'o // bdag gi ming dang gzugs so //
translated: I am conscious.🔽This is my name-and-form.

original: bdag gi ming dang gzugs can no //
analyzed: bdag gi ming dang gzugs can no //
translated: I have a name and form.

original: bdag gi skye mched drug go //
analyzed: bdag gi skye mched drug go //
translated: This is my six sense sources.

original: bdag ni skye mched drug can no //🔽bdag gi reg pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni skye mched drug can no // bdag gi reg pa'o //
translated: I have six sense sources.🔽This is my contact.

original: bdag ni reg par byed pa'o //🔽bdag gi tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni reg par byed pa'o // bdag gi tshor ba'o //
translated: I make contact.🔽This is my feeling.

original: bdag ni tshor bar byed pa'o //🔽bdag gi sred pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni tshor bar byed pa'o // bdag gi sred pa'o //
translated: I feel.🔽This is my craving.

original: bdag ni sred par byed @500b pa'o //🔽bdag gi len pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni sred par byed @500b pa'o // bdag gi len pa'o //
translated: I crave.🔽This is my grasping.

original: bdag ni len pa can no //🔽bdag gi srid pa'o //🔽bdag ni srid pa can no //
analyzed: bdag ni len pa can no // bdag gi srid pa'o // bdag ni srid pa can no //
translated: I grasp.🔽This is my becoming.🔽I become.

original: bdag gi skye ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi skye ba'o //
translated: This is my birth.

original: bdag ni skye ba'i chos can no //
analyzed: bdag ni skye ba'i chos can no //
translated: I am subject to birth.

original: bdag gi rga shi'o //
analyzed: bdag gi rga shi'o //
translated: This is my old age and death.

original: bdag ni rga shi'i chos can no //
analyzed: bdag ni rga shi'i chos can no //
translated: I am subject to old age and death.

original: bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is my perfection of generosity.

original: bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the perfection of generosity.

original: bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is my perfection of moral discipline.

original: bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the perfection of moral discipline.

original: bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is my perfection of patience.

original: bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the perfection of patience.

original: bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is my perfection of perseverance.

original: bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is my perfection of concentration.

original: bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the perfection of concentration.

original: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is my perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will become familiar with the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: bdag gi phyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi phyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of external phenomena.

original: bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will become familiar with the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: bdag gi phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will become familiar with the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of emptiness.

original: bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la goms @501a *//
analyzed: bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la goms @501a *//
translated: I will become familiar with the emptiness of emptiness.

original: par bya'o // bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: par bya'o // bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of great extent.

original: bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will become familiar with the emptiness of great extent.

original: bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will become familiar with the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is my emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: I have the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: bdag gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: I have the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: I have the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: bdag gi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: I have the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: bdag gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: I have the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: I have the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: bdag gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: “The emptiness of its own mark is my emptiness.

original: bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I should cultivate familiarity with the emptiness of my own mark.

original: bdag gi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: “The emptiness of nonapprehension is my emptiness.

original: bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I should cultivate familiarity with the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: bdag gi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: “The emptiness of nonthings is my emptiness.

original: bdag @501b gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag @501b gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I should cultivate familiarity with the emptiness of nonthings.

original: bdag gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: “The emptiness of essential nature is my emptiness.

original: bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I should cultivate familiarity with the emptiness of essential nature.

original: bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: “The emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is my emptiness.

original: bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o //
translated: I should cultivate familiarity with the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: bdag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
translated: “The applications of mindfulness are mine.

original: bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I should practice the applications of mindfulness.

original: bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnams so //
translated: “The right efforts are mine.

original: bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the right efforts.

original: bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
translated: These are my bases of spiritual power.

original: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the bases of spiritual power.

original: bdag gi dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi dbang po rnams so //
translated: These are my faculties.

original: bdag gis dbang po rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis dbang po rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the faculties.

original: bdag gi stobs rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi stobs rnams so //
translated: These are my powers.

original: bdag gis stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the powers.

original: bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: These are my branches of enlightenment.

original: bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the branches of enlightenment.

original: bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the noble eightfold path.

original: bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the noble eightfold path.

original: bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
translated: These are the noble truths.

original: bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the noble truths.

original: bdag gi bsam gtan rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi bsam gtan rnams so //
translated: These are my concentrations.

original: bdag gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the concentrations.

original: bdag gi tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: “These are my immeasurables.

original: bdag gis tshad med pa rnams pa spyad par bya'o //🔽bdag gi gzugs med pa'i @502a *//
analyzed: bdag gis tshad med pa rnams pa spyad par bya'o // bdag gi gzugs med pa'i @502a *//
translated: I will practice the immeasurables.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: “These are my formless absorptions.

original: bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the formless absorptions.

original: bdag gi rnam par thar pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi rnam par thar pa rnams so //
translated: “These are my liberations.

original: bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the liberations.

original: bdag gi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: “These are my aspects of liberation.

original: bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the aspects of liberation.

original: bdag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: “These are the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are the gateways to liberation.

original: bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are the gateways to liberation.

original: bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnams so //
translated: “These are my higher cognitions.

original: bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the superknowledges.

original: bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: These are my meditative stabilities.

original: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the meditative stabilities.

original: bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
translated: These are my dhāraṇī gateways.

original: bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
translated: These are the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: bdag gi mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
translated: These are the fearlessnesses.

original: bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the fearlessnesses.

original: bdag gi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
translated: These are the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: bdag gi byams pa @502b chen po'o //
analyzed: bdag gi byams pa @502b chen po'o //
translated: This is my great love.

original: bdag gis byams pa chen po la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis byams pa chen po la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice great love.

original: bdag gi snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: bdag gi snying rje chen po'o //
translated: This is my great compassion.

original: bdag gis snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o //
