original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po @510a *//🔽gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po @510a *// gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice in order to apprehend or not apprehend great love,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice in order to apprehend or not apprehend great compassion,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice in order to apprehend or not apprehend the distinct attributes of the buddhas,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping the result of stream enterer,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping the result of once-returner,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping the result of non-returner,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping the state of a worthy one,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rang byang chub gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rang byang chub gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping the knowledge of path aspects,

original: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram /🔽mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni /
analyzed: mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram / mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni /
translated: to practice for the sake of grasping or not grasping the knowledge of all aspects,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the perfection of morality,🔽they cannot cultivate the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //🔽nang stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so // nang stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the perfection of wisdom.🔽They cannot cultivate inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par @510b mi nus so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par @510b mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate ultimate emptiness,🔽they cannot cultivate conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate unconditioned emptiness,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽“They cannot cultivate the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽“They cannot cultivate the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of non-entities.🔽“They cannot cultivate the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: “They cannot cultivate the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the faculties,

original: stobs rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: stobs rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //🔽gzugs med @511a *//
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so // gzugs med @511a *//
translated: they cannot cultivate the immeasurables,

original: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the successive absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, which are the gateways to liberation,🔽they cannot cultivate the clairvoyances,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so; ;ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so; ;ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate fearlessness;

original: so so yang dag par rig par nams bsgom par mi nus so //🔽byams pa chen po bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par nams bsgom par mi nus so // byams pa chen po bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽they cannot cultivate great love;

original: snying rje chen po bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the result of stream enterer;

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom par mi nus so //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom par mi nus so // dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate the result of non-returner;🔽they cannot cultivate the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rang byang chub bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot cultivate knowledge of path aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: and they cannot cultivate the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun @511b pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun @511b pa ste /
translated: “Lord, this dharma is in harmony with all dharmas.

original: chos 'di chos gang rnams dang rjes su mthun pa lags she na /
analyzed: chos 'di chos gang rnams dang rjes su mthun pa lags she na /
translated: With which dharmas is this dharma in harmony?

original: chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This dharma is in harmony with the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This dharma is in harmony with the perfection of concentration.

original: chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This dharma is in harmony with the perfection of perseverance.

original: chos 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This dharma is in harmony with the perfection of patience.

original: chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This dharma is in harmony with the perfection of morality.

original: chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This dharma is in harmony with the perfection of giving.

original: chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with inner emptiness.

original: chos 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with outer emptiness.

original: chos 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with inner and outer emptiness.

original: chos 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chos 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with great emptiness.

original: chos 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //🔽chos 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o // chos 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: chos 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //🔽chos 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o // chos 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: chos 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: chos 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: chos 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //🔽chos 'di ni @512a *//
analyzed: chos 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o // chos 'di ni @512a *//
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: chos 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //🔽chos 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o // chos 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of the absence of things.

original: chos 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of essence.

original: chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the emptiness of the essence of non-existence.

original: chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the applications of mindfulness.

original: chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the right efforts.

original: chos 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //🔽chos 'di ni dbang po rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o // chos 'di ni dbang po rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the bases of spiritual power.🔽This Dharma is in harmony with the faculties.

original: chos 'di ni stobs rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni stobs rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the powers.

original: chos 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the branches of enlightenment.

original: chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the noble eightfold path.

original: chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the noble truths.

original: chos 'di ni bsam gtan rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni bsam gtan rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the meditative concentrations.

original: chos 'di ni tshad med pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni tshad med pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the immeasurables.

original: chos 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the formless absorptions.

original: chos 'di ni rnam par thar pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rnam par thar pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the liberations.

original: chos 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rjes @512b su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rjes @512b su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the successive meditative absorptions.

original: chos 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the superknowledges.

original: chos 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the meditative stabilities.

original: chos 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the powers of the thus-gone ones.

original: chos 'di ni mi 'jigs pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni mi 'jigs pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the fearlessnesses.

original: chos 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //🔽chos 'di ni byams pa chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o // chos 'di ni byams pa chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the correct understandings.🔽This Dharma accords with great love.

original: chos 'di ni snying rje chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni snying rje chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with great compassion.

original: chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the unshared qualities of the buddhas.

original: chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the result of stream enterer.

original: chos 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the result of once-returner.

original: chos 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the result of non-returner.

original: chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the state of a worthy one.

original: chos 'di ni rang byang chub dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rang byang chub dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: chos 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the knowledge of path aspects.

original: chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: This Dharma accords with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: chos 'di ni gang la'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: chos 'di ni gang la'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste /
translated: This Dharma is unobstructed with regard to anything.

original: ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na /
analyzed: ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na /
translated: What is it unobstructed with regard to?

original: gzugs @513a *// la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs @513a *// la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: It is unobstructed with regard to form.

original: tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: It is unobstructed with regard to feeling.

original: 'du shes la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du shes la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his perceptions.

original: 'du byed la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du byed la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his consciousness.

original: mig la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽rna ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽sna la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig la thogs pa ma mchis so // rna ba la thogs pa ma mchis so // sna la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his eyes.🔽He is unimpeded in his ears.🔽He is unimpeded in his nose.

original: lce la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his tongue.

original: lus la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his body.

original: yid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his mind.

original: gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his forms.

original: sgra la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽dri la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽ro la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sgra la thogs pa ma mchis so // dri la thogs pa ma mchis so // ro la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his sounds.🔽He is unimpeded in his smells.🔽He is unimpeded in his tastes.

original: reg la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his textures.

original: chos la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so // sna'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his eye consciousness.🔽He is unimpeded in his ear consciousness.🔽He is unimpeded in his nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in his tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the mind consciousness,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the contact that is the coming together of eye,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the contact that is the coming together of ear,🔽there is no obstruction in the contact that is the coming together of nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the contact that is the coming together of tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the contact that is the coming together of body,

original: yid @513b kyi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid @513b kyi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the contact that is the coming together of mind,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of eye,🔽there is no obstruction in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of ear,🔽there is no obstruction in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to feelings that arise from the condition of the coming together of the body, touch, and consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to feelings that arise from the condition of the coming together of the mind, mental phenomena, and consciousness.

original: sa'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sa'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chu'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the water element.

original: me'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽rlung gi khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: me'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so // rlung gi khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the fire element.🔽He is unimpeded with regard to the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ma rig pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to ignorance.

original: 'du byed la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du byed la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to name and form.

original: skye mched drug la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye mched drug la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the six sense sources.

original: reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to contact.

original: tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to feeling.

original: sred pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sred pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to craving.

original: len pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: len pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in taking up.

original: srid pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: srid pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in existence.

original: skye ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye ba la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in birth.

original: rga shi la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rga shi la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis @514a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis @514a *//
translated: He is unimpeded in the perfection of generosity.

original: so // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: so // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽nang stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so // nang stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in the perfection of wisdom.🔽He is unimpeded in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so /
translated: He is unimpeded in inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics.🔽He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po @514b med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po @514b med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽dbang po rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so // dbang po rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the legs of miraculous power.🔽He is unimpeded with regard to the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: stobs rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽tshad med pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so // tshad med pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the meditative stabilities.🔽He is unimpeded with regard to the immeasurable aspirations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: He is unimpeded with regard to the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the concentrations,🔽there is no obstruction in the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates to liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so // ting nge 'dzin rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the higher knowledges,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽byams pa @515a *//
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so // byams pa @515a *//
translated: there is no obstruction in the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: chen po la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chen po la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in great love,

original: snying rje chen po la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no obstruction in great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and there is no obstruction in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: they are unimpeded in the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: they are unimpeded in the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so // dgra bcom pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: they are unimpeded in the result of non-returner,🔽they are unimpeded in the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang byang chub la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: they are unimpeded in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: they are unimpeded in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and they are unimpeded in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: This Dharma is the same as space, the same as suchness, the same as the dharma-constituent, the same as the very limit of reality, the same as the inconceivable element, the same as emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is characterized by non-obstruction, because of the sameness of signlessness, wishlessness, non-production, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification.

original: chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi @515b skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi @515b skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: This Dharma is not the apprehension of the production of form, not the apprehension of the production of feeling, not the apprehension of the production of perception, not the apprehension of the production of volitional factors, and not the apprehension of the production of consciousness.

original: mig gi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is not the apprehension of the production of the eyes, not the apprehension of the production of the ears, not the apprehension of the production of the nose, not the apprehension of the production of the tongue, not the apprehension of the production of the body, and not the apprehension of the production of the mind.

original: gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sgra'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dri'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ro'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / reg gi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chos kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sgra'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dri'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ro'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / reg gi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chos kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of form, the non-apprehension of the arising of sound, the non-apprehension of the arising of smell, the non-apprehension of the arising of taste, the non-apprehension of the arising of feeling, and the non-apprehension of the arising of dharmas.🔽the non-apprehension of the arising of eye consciousness, the non-apprehension of the arising of ear consciousness, the non-apprehension of the arising of nose consciousness, the non-apprehension of the arising of tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of body consciousness, the non-apprehension of the arising of thinking consciousness, the non-apprehension of the arising of eye contact, the non-apprehension of the arising of ear contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / @516a *//
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / @516a *//
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of the union of nose contact, the non-apprehension of the arising of the union of tongue contact, the non-apprehension of the arising of the union of body contact, and the non-apprehension of the arising of the union of mind contact.🔽the non-apprehension of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, the non-apprehension of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the non-apprehension of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the non-apprehension of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, and the non-apprehension of the arising of the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sa'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sa'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is to not apprehend the origination of feelings that arise from the union of mind and mental phenomena. It is to not apprehend the origination of the earth element, the water element, the fire element, the wind element,🔽the space element, or the consciousness element. It is to not apprehend the origination of ignorance, formation, consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug gi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug gi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving,

original: len pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: len pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the birth of appropriation, the non-apprehension of the birth of existence, the non-apprehension of the birth of birth, the non-apprehension of the birth of old age and death, the non-apprehension of the birth of the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / @516b brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / @516b brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the birth of the perfection of morality, the non-apprehension of the birth of the perfection of patience, the non-apprehension of the birth of the perfection of effort, the non-apprehension of the birth of the perfection of meditation,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the birth of the perfection of wisdom, the non-apprehension of the birth of inner emptiness, the non-apprehension of the birth of outer emptiness, the non-apprehension of the birth of inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of emptiness, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of the great, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of the ultimate, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of the compounded,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of the uncompounded, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of inherent nature, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of all phenomena, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of specific characteristics, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of non-things, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of essential nature, the non-apprehension of the arising of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things, the non-apprehension of the arising of the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul @517a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul @517a *//
translated: the non-apprehension of the arising of the right efforts, the non-apprehension of the arising of the

original: gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / stobs rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / stobs rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the limbs of awakening do not come to be, the path does not come to be, the powers do not come to be, the faculties do not come to be, the aspects of awakening do not come to be, and the noble eightfold path does not come to be.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
