original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the applications of mindfulness have no arising, the right efforts have no arising, the legs of miraculous power have no arising, the faculties have no arising, the powers have no arising, the limbs of awakening have no arising, the path has no arising, the ten powers have no arising, the four fearlessnesses have no arising, the four detailed and thorough knowledges have no arising, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha have no arising, and the perfection of giving has no arising.🔽The perfection of morality has no arising, the perfection of patience has no arising, the perfection of perseverance has no arising, the perfection of concentration has no arising, the perfection of wisdom has no arising, the emptiness meditative stabilization has no arising, the signless meditative stabilization has no arising, the wishless meditative stabilization has no arising, the applications of mindfulness have no arising, the right efforts have no arising, the legs of miraculous power have no arising, the faculties have no arising, the powers have no arising, the limbs of awakening have no arising, the path has no arising, the ten powers have no arising, the four fearlessnesses have no arising, the four detailed and thorough knowledges have no arising, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha have no arising, and the perfection of giving has no arising.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / snying rje chen po'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / snying rje chen po'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: The perfection of morality has no arising, the perfection of patience has no arising, the perfection of perseverance has no arising, the perfection of concentration has no arising, the perfection of wisdom has no arising, the emptiness meditative stabilization has no arising, the signless meditative stabilization has no arising, the wishless meditative stabilization has no arising, the applications of mindfulness have no arising, the right efforts have no arising, the legs of miraculous power have no arising, the faculties have no arising, the powers have no arising, the limbs of awakening have no arising, the path has no arising, the ten powers have no arising, the four fearlessnesses have no arising, the four detailed and thorough knowledges have no arising, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha have no arising, and the perfection of giving has no arising.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i @517b 'bras bu'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i @517b 'bras bu'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: It is non-arising because the arising of the powers is non-apprehensible,🔽because the arising of the strengths is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the aspects of enlightenment is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the four fearlessnesses is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o //
translated: because the arising of the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible, because the arising of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is non-apprehensible, because the arising of the knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible, and because the arising of the knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible.

original: chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rten mi dmigs pa dang /🔽rna ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / sgra'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / sgra'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: This Dharma is the non-apprehension of the support of form, the non-apprehension of the support of feeling, the non-apprehension of the support of perception, the non-apprehension of the support of formation, the non-apprehension of the support of consciousness, the non-apprehension of the support of the eyes,🔽the non-apprehension of the support of the ears, the non-apprehension of the support of the nose, the non-apprehension of the support of the tongue, the non-apprehension of the support of the body, the non-apprehension of the support of the mind, the non-apprehension of the support of a form, the non-apprehension of the support of a sound,

original: dri'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / ro'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / reg gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chos kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: dri'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / ro'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / reg gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chos kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the support of a smell, the non-apprehension of the support of a taste, the non-apprehension of the support of a feeling, the non-apprehension of the support of a dharma, the non-apprehension of the support of the eye consciousness, the non-apprehension of the support of the ear consciousness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig @518a *//
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig @518a *//
translated: the non-apprehension of the support of the nose consciousness, the non-apprehension of the support of the tongue consciousness, the non-apprehension of the support of the body consciousness, and the non-apprehension of the support of the mind consciousness.🔽the non-apprehension of the support of eye contact, the non-apprehension of the support of ear contact, the non-apprehension of the support of nose contact, the non-apprehension of the support of tongue contact, the non-apprehension of the support of body contact,

original: gi 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: gi 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: and

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the basis of the mental component of contact, the non-apprehension of the basis of the feeling that arises from the contact of the eye, the non-apprehension of the basis of the feeling that arises from the contact of the ear, the non-apprehension of the basis of the feeling that arises from the contact of the nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las 'byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las 'byung ba'i tshor ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the basis of the feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue, the non-apprehension of the basis of the feeling that arises from the contact of the body, and the non-apprehension of the basis of the feeling that arises from the contact of the mind.

original: sa'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the earth element as a support, the water element as a support, the fire element as a support, the wind element as a support, the space element as a support, and the consciousness element as a support;

original: ma rig pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: ignorance as a support, volitional actions as a support, consciousness as a support, name and form as a support, the six sense sources as a support, contact as a support,

original: tshor @518b ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / len pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: tshor @518b ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / len pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: feeling as a support, craving as a support, grasping as a support, becoming as a support, birth as a support, and aging and death as a support;

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the support for the perfection of generosity is non-apprehended, the support for the perfection of ethical discipline is non-apprehended, the support for the perfection of patience is non-apprehended, the support for the perfection of perseverance is non-apprehended,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the support for the perfection of concentration is non-apprehended, the support for the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehended, the support for inner emptiness is non-apprehended, the support for outer emptiness is non-apprehended,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the support for inner and outer emptiness is non-apprehended, the support for the emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehended, the support for great emptiness is non-apprehended, the support for ultimate emptiness is non-apprehended,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the non-apprehension of a basis, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the non-apprehension of a basis, the emptiness of what transcends limits, the non-apprehension of a basis, the emptiness of no beginning and no end, the non-apprehension of a basis,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs @519a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs @519a *//
translated: the emptiness of non-rejection, the non-apprehension of a basis, the emptiness of a basic nature, the non-apprehension of a basis, the emptiness of all phenomena, the non-apprehension of a basis, the emptiness of specific characteristics, the non-apprehension of a basis,

original: pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / stobs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / stobs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the emptiness of things, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the emptiness of intrinsic nature, and the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the emptiness of the nature of nonthings.🔽the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the applications of mindfulness, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the right efforts, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the legs of miraculous power, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the faculties, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the branches of awakening, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the noble eightfold path, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the noble truths, the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the concentrations, and the emptiness of nonobservation as the basis of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the formless absorptions, the bases of subjugation, the bases of totality, the limitless ones, the bases of the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space, the bases of the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness, the bases of the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing-at-all, and the bases of the meditative absorption of neither perception nor non-perception;

original: smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, and the wishless meditative stabilization;🔽the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;🔽the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening;🔽the ten tathāgata powers;🔽the four fearlessnesses;🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽great love;🔽great compassion;

original: mi 'jigs pa'i rten @519b mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i rten @519b mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the gods in the desire realm and the gods in the form realm said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: the elder Subhūti

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so //
translated: has been born after the Lord.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: Because, Lord,

original: ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston to //
analyzed: ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston to //
translated: Whatever is taught, all that is taught by taking emptiness as a starting point.

original: mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to //
analyzed: mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to //
translated: It is taught by taking signlessness and wishlessness as a starting point.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to those gods who live in the desire realm and those who live in the form realm:

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas @520a *//
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas @520a *//
translated: “Gods!

original: brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The gods say, ‘The Lord says that the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata.’

original: ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata?

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: The elder Subhūti

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste /
translated: is born after the Tathāgata’s suchness.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na /
translated: Just as the thusness of the Tathāgata is neither future nor past, so too the thusness of the elder Subhūti is neither future nor past.

original: thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
translated: From the very beginning, the elder Subhūti has been born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o //
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is also the thusness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste /
translated: The thusness of all phenomena is also the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang de bzhin nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang de bzhin nyid ma yin no //
translated: That thusness of the Tathāgata is not thusness.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: In this way, the elder Subhūti

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
translated: has been born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin nyid du /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin nyid du /
translated: Just as the thusness of the Tathāgata is,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
translated: the elder Subhūti abides in thusness, and so has been born after the Tathāgata.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the thusness of the Thus-Gone One is unchanging and nonconceptual,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la /
translated: so too the thusness of the elder Subhūti is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la'ang thogs @520b pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la'ang thogs @520b pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the thusness of the Thus-Gone One is unobstructed with regard to anything,

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci la'ang thogs pa med de /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci la'ang thogs pa med de /
translated: so too the thusness of all phenomena is unobstructed with regard to anything.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The thusness of the Thus-Gone One and the thusness of all phenomena

original: de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med la /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med la /
translated: are thusness that is one and not two, and cannot be made two.

original: de bzhin nyid de'ang ma byas pa ste /🔽de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med de /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de'ang ma byas pa ste / de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med de /
translated: That thusness is unfabricated.🔽That thusness is not something that has not become thus.

original: de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med pas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med pas /
translated: Since that thusness is not something that has not become thus,

original: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste /
translated: Therefore, that suchness is nondual and indivisible.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: In this way, the elder Subhūti

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
translated: is born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is everywhere unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par mi rtog /
analyzed: de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par mi rtog /
translated: In the same way, the suchness of Subhūti is everywhere unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: rnam par rtog pa med la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med la /
translated: It is nonconceptual.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa /
translated: Just as the suchness of the Tathāgata is undifferentiated,

original: dbyer med pa /
analyzed: dbyer med pa /
translated: indivisible,🔽not a differentiator,

original: 'byed pa ma yin pa /🔽dmigs su med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'byed pa ma yin pa / dmigs su med pa de bzhin du /
translated: and not apprehended,

original: rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa /
translated: in the same way, the suchness of Subhūti is undifferentiated,

original: dbyer med pa /
analyzed: dbyer med pa /
translated: indivisible,

original: 'byed pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'byed pa ma yin pa /
translated: not a differentiator,

original: dmigs su med pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa ste /
translated: and not apprehended.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /
translated: In this way, the elder Subhūti

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
translated: is born after the Tathāgata.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as the thusness of the Tathāgata is not separate from the thusness of all phenomena,

original: de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa @521a *//
analyzed: de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa @521a *//
translated: it is never not thus.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: It is not thus.

original: rtag tu de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rtag tu de bzhin nyid do //
translated: It is always thus.

original: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa med pa ste /
translated: In the same way, the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata without being a different aspect, but he is not born anywhere.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so //
translated: Thus, the elder Subhūti🔽is born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so /
translated: He is born after the Tathāgata.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
translated: By the sameness of the thusness of the past,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: the thusness of the Tathāgata is the same.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
translated: By the sameness of the thusness of the Tathāgata,

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: the thusness of the past is the same.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
translated: The suchness of the future is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //🔽da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
translated: The suchness of the past is the same as the suchness of the future.🔽The suchness of the future is the same as the suchness of the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the present is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the past.🔽The suchness of the past is the same as the suchness of the future.

original: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the future is the same as the suchness of the present.

original: de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do ////
analyzed: de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do ////
translated: Thus, the suchness of the past, future, and present and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.
